title: Winter Sale? YAY OR NAY
body: I been saving my rp for a winter sale like last year, so I'm wondering if theres going to be one this year before I spend them! <3 thanks in advance

replies.body: If you mean by "winter sale" a special discount shop, I'm pretty sure that is not going to happen, since it's already Christmas Eve and they've made no announcement regarding that whatsoever.

for meits christmas since my background is mostly german, since germany is a day ahead of NA we do christmas on christmas eve instead, but yeah they probably wont do any sales...

I haven't seen any official announcement for one and since we've already announced and are still in the middle of Snowdown 2016, I wouldn't hold out for a personalized shop this year. There are still [**a ton of awesome things going on**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/snowdown-2016), though, so don't miss out!
